en: Judges of the Third Circuit Court of Appeals in Philadelphia, c.1950

This photograph is titled, "Judges of the Third Circuit Court of Appeals in Philadelphia, c. 1950". William Hastie was born in Knoxville in 1904 and graduated from Harvard Law School in 1930.  As part of his distinguished career in federal service, he was appointed to the Thrid Circuit Court of Appeals in Philadelphia in 1949 by President Harry Truman.
